extendedInfo.description: WANNA PUT A SMILE ON YOUR FACE?FIND THE FUNNIEST JOKES HERE!Have you ever been in a company through friends and family, telling each other jokes? 18,000 COOL JOKES is an app that will always give you more and more jokes to tell and laugh. And if you just feel like wasting 5 minutes, you can always open 18000 Cool Jokes and put the smile on :)We are happy to present to you, the funniest app for Android!EXAMPLESAn angry husband returned home one night to find his wife in bed with a naked man.âWhat are you doingâ he shouted.To which his wife said to her loverâSee, I told you he was stupid.ââââA guy goes into a bar, orders twelve shots and starts drinking them as fast as he can. The bartender says:- Dang, why are you drinking so fast?- You would be drinking fast if you had what I have.- What do you have?- 75 cents.âââQ: Why did God create man before woman?A: He didnât want any advice.âââA blonde call the fire department, because her house was on fire. They ask her how to get there and she replies: âDuh, big red truck!!!ââââA little girl asked Santa âSanta, send me a sister.âSanta said âOn one condition, send me your motherâ-------------OVERVIEW-------------We have created the most advanced jokes application to give you jokes for your taste. With an intelligent algorithm considering your ratings and other peopleâs ratings, 18 000 COOL JOKES shows you the next joke you will like, and now you donât have to read the same joke twice.-------------FEATURES-------------* Easy PREV/NEXT navigation* Shake detection for a random joke* Rate jokes online-------------QUANTITIES-------------* 18,000+ jokes â no internet connection required* 49 categories â for anyone and any taste* 50 best rated jokes â daily and weekly-------------SHARING-------------* Facebook* Twitter* E-mail* Copy to clipboard-------------SECTIONS & FILTERS-------------* Favorites section for your favorite jokes* Kids safe with Adult filter* Filter by length â short/medium/long* Settings section accessible from within the app* Search jokes by keywordsEnjoy!

reviews.title: Americarod1998
reviews.comment: I LOVE 18, 000 COOL JOKES PEOPLE SHOULD TRY THIS COOL JOKES
reviews.author: America Rodriguez

reviews.title: Lol, love it!
reviews.comment: Great and funny. I love going on this. You can even save the ones you like in the fav\'s and show your friends later! Plus you can pick what topic u want. Love this!
reviews.author: Lydia Weik

reviews.comment: Cool and awesome, the jokes are hilarious though some need to be a bit more mature,yet its good
reviews.author: Siddharth Sridhar

reviews.comment: It\'s awesome.its of new jokes, very creative and diverse. Definitely loving this app. :))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kinda annoying
reviews.comment: This is a funny app! It works great doesn\'t take a lot of time to load like other games (pocket frog etc.) I would deffinatlly get it. But with that, i have had to uninstall and re-download it several times
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load ANYTHING.
reviews.comment: This app will NOT load ANY jokes at all... nothing shows.. and I currently have a Galaxy S3, its rather dissapointing.. I had this app on my iPod and loved it...
reviews.author: Ashlee Scheuermann

reviews.title: SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB 7\"
reviews.comment: Really good, but sometimes when I open it, the jokes are missing and nothing works. Then I have to quit it and reopen it for it to work properly. Please fix this. I noticed that bug many many times
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: I love it. Creative n entertaining
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t work
reviews.comment: I had it on my galaxy s and it was great it had really funny jokes. But I upgraded to galaxy s3 and it\'s blank. No jokes at all! Please fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work on  AT&T Samsung Galaxy Express
reviews.comment: I wanted to try this app because my friend has it on his I-Phone. I asked him what it was called, looked it up and found out it was this. It doesn\'t work on my Samsung Galaxy Express, Android Phone!! Why??? Please fix this!! 3 stars, only because when I saw the jokes on my friends phone, they were funny!!!
reviews.author: Justin Lee

reviews.comment: Hahahaha omfg this app is definitely in my top 5 so funny but sometimes when I open it....it\'s totally blank they should fix it but really good app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t show any jokes
reviews.comment: Not a single joke showed up even after restarting, and uninstalling and reinstalling
reviews.author: Mike Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Dissapointed
reviews.comment: A day after using this app, all the jokes were gone even though everything was on in the settings!  Totally uncool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it so please fix it.
reviews.comment: I was using this app on an HTC EVO and it worked great!  The jokes were long but good.  I installed it on my Galaxy S3 and it runs but no text shows at all.  Please fix it. I like this app.
reviews.author: Wade Thompson

reviews.title: Fix please Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: I loved this app on my old phone and when I got my new phone them app down loads but when opened no jokes come up that sucks. Fix it please. Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.author: Sheldon Turner

reviews.title: NOT for now....
reviews.comment: Does not load any jokes no matter how hard I try....am on Galaxy SII. I saw it work on a friend\'s phone and was cool...decided to look for it but....
reviews.author: Ndegwa Evans

reviews.title: No Jokes
reviews.comment: I have this app on my iphone and it works great. I downloaded the android version for my new tablet and it doesn\'t work. When I open it the interface is there, but no jokes. I even did a search for \"blonde\" and it came back and said there were 0 results!!
reviews.author: Deana Gough

reviews.comment: Its ok i got a joke ur mums face is so ugly even bob the builder could\'nt fix it i made it my self lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It doesnt work
reviews.comment: I have the same app on my iphone and it works perfectly. I havent been able to use it once on my droid
reviews.author: A Google User
